data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in Toluca.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Can Juarez get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toluca's half?
Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 2, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a throw-in for Toluca, close to Juarez's area.
In Toluca Toluca attack through William da Silva. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the away team in Toluca.
Juarez's Blas Armoa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Toluca have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Enrique Triverio for Toluca gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Juarez a goal kick.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 12, Juarez to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 15, Juarez have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Juarez.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Fabian (Juarez) has received a yellow card from Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In the minute 18, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Toluca a goal kick.
Toluca's Rubens Sambueza misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 19, In Toluca a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Toluca.
In Toluca, Enrique Triverio (Toluca) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 22, Toluca's Alexis Canelo is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
Toluca's Alan Medina breaks free at Estadio Nemesio Diez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 23, It's a goal kick for the away team in Toluca.
Toluca are whistled for offside.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Toluca in the half of Juarez.
Alexis Canelo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Alexis Canelo (Toluca) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Michael Estrada.
In the minute 28, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Toluca throw-in in Juarez's half.
Toluca's Michael Estrada gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Nemesio Diez. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Marco Fabian for Juarez drives towards goal at Estadio Nemesio Diez. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 32, Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Toluca a goal kick.
Brandon Sartiaguin for Toluca has been booked by Oscar Mejia Garcia and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 35, Important block from the Toluca defence as Marco Fabian fires in a strike for Juarez.
Toluca will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Juarez.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
In the minute 38, Juarez have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In Toluca Juarez attack through Dario Lezcano. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to Juarez.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Juarez have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In the minute 40, Free kick Toluca.
Jefferson Intriago (Juarez) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Juarez.
In the minute 42, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Alan Medina of Toluca gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
In the minute 43, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Juarez throw-in in Toluca's half.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
In the minute 45, Juarez to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In Toluca a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, Oscar Mejia Garcia blows to end the first-half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia has blown to start the second-half.
Toluca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 47, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Juarez in the half of Toluca.
Toluca needs to be cautious. Juarez have an attacking throw-in.
Goal! Juarez have got their heads in front thanks to a Dario Lezcano strike.
In the minute 50, Great play from Luis Lopez to set up the goal.
Toluca have a goal kick.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Toluca are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Toluca Toluca drive forward through Rubens Sambueza. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Free kick Toluca.
In the minute 58, Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Juarez are coming forward and Marco Fabian gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 60, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Toluca a goal kick.
Jose Manuel De la Torre is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Nemesio Diez with Pablo Lopez replacing William da Silva.
Jose Manuel De la Torre (Toluca) is making a third substitution, with Kevin Castaneda replacing Alan Medina.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the away team in Toluca.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the home team a throw-in.
Alan Mendoza of Juarez smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Juarez.
Juarez surge into the attack at Estadio Nemesio Diez but Gustavo Velazquez’s header is off-target.
Toluca have a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Can Juarez capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toluca's half?
Juarez make their first substitution with Mauro Fernandez replacing Alan Mendoza.
The away team have replaced Marco Fabian with Flavio Santos. This is the second substitution made today by Gabriel Caballero.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Juarez drives forward and Blas Armoa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Toluca pushes forward through Enrique Triverio, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 67, Juarez have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Martin Rabunal (Juarez) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 68, Throw-in high up the field for Toluca in Toluca.
Juarez's Maximiliano Olivera breaks free at Estadio Nemesio Diez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Juarez.
Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Toluca to take a throw-in in Juarez territory.
In the minute 73, Blas Armoa for Juarez gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Toluca a goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Toluca to check on Blas Armoa, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 74, Gabriel Caballero (Juarez) has taken off Blas Armoa who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Jesus Zavala is the replacement.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Throw-in for Toluca close to the penalty box.
In the minute 76, Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
Juarez awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Toluca.
In the minute 78, Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Toluca throw-in in Juarez's half.
Free kick for Toluca in the half of Juarez.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Juarez.
Toluca have a goal kick.
Toluca's Adrian Mora gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Can Juarez get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toluca's half?
In Toluca Juarez attack through Mauro Fernandez. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Juarez a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
Diego Abella is replacing Pablo Lopez for the home team.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Michael Estrada for Toluca who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Attention is being given to Juarez’s Dario Lezcano and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 87, Dario Lezcano is back on his feet again.
Michael Estrada has recovered and rejoins the match in Toluca.
In Toluca, Diego Abella of Toluca is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Toluca throw-in in Juarez's half.
In the minute 89, Elio Castro is on a sub for Martin Rabunal for Juarez.
Kevin Castaneda for Toluca gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Juarez have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
At Estadio Nemesio Diez the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Toluca close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
Toluca have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Toluca capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Rubens Sambueza of Toluca smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Toluca have a dangerous throw-in.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Oscar Mejia Garcia blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
